trans-unit.source: Cache directory for PhealNG data: Full path to a existing and writable directory. If not defined (maybe insecure) typo3temp directory will be used.
Timeout value for used connections: Value in seconds. Default are 120 seconds.
Should HTTPS connection be verified? Be sure that your typo3 system could verify CCP certificate.
Static URI part to eve-central: Default to http://api.eve-central.com/api/marketstat
Configure create mask for a file: No value means using default pheal value (0666). Hint: use same setting as [BE][fileCreateMask]
Configure create mask for a folder: No value means using default pheal value (0777). Hint: use same setting as [BE][folderCreateMask]
